doc.field: American Institute of the City of New York for the Encouragement of Science and Invention records
American Institute of the City of New York for the Encouragement of Science and Invention records

The contents of Subseries 3: Bound Volumes parallels the kind of information found in Subseries 1: Annual Fairs and Subseries 2: Administrative. Volumes are arranged into several different categories: account books, bank books, cash books, check books, minute books, receipt books, records books, registers, reports, and roll books. Each category is subsequently arranged by date. Researchers consulting administrative information and specific annual fairs are encouraged to also consult any pertinent bound volumes for the corresponding time period, and vice versa.
American Institute of the City of New York for the Encouragement of Science and Invention records
Series I: Annual Fair Years, 1808-1930 >> Subseries 3: Bound Volumes, 1828-1936, n.d.
